item.title: 商界警告：里夫斯面临预算后通胀再次飙升的风险
item.description: 顽固的通货膨胀已成为英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）第一份预算案的最大弊端之一。她有可能在第二份预算中重蹈覆辙。【原文：Stubborn inflation has emerged as one of the biggest drawbacks from Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ first budget. She risks repeating the result with her second.】

item.title: 交易商关注巴西港口大火，铁矿石维持在高位附近
item.description: 铁矿石在周二的高点附近持稳，因为交易商们担心巴西一个主要的炼钢原料出口枢纽发生火灾。【原文：Iron ore held steady near Tuesday’s highs, as traders eyed a fire at a major Brazilian hub for exports of the steel-making ingredient.】

item.title: 中国石油库存增加令新加坡贸易商猜测不断
item.description: 在本周举行的亚洲最大的石油高管和交易商聚会上，有两个问题笼罩着每一次谈话：中国正在为其战略石油储备购买多少石油？【原文：At Asia’s biggest gathering of oil executives and traders this week, two questions loomed over every conversation: How much is China buying for its strategic petroleum reserves, and how long will Beijing keep going?】

item.title: 澳大利亚退休人员需要 45.5 万美元的储蓄才能过上舒适的生活
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，澳大利亚人将需要多达69万澳元（45.5万美元）的养老金储蓄才能安享晚年，该报告强调了即使在澳大利亚备受全球推崇的养老金制度下，不断上涨的生活成本也如何使家庭预算捉襟见肘。【原文：Australians will need as much as A$690,000 ($455,000) of pension savings to retire comfortably, according to a new report that highlights how rising living costs are stretching household budgets even under the country’s globally admired pensions system.】

item.title: 印尼总统普拉博沃在英德拉瓦蒂两次提出辞职后将其解雇
item.description: 八月的最后一个周末，时任印尼财政部长的斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）在自己的住宅被抢劫者洗劫一空后，前往总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）位于西爪哇省汉巴兰（Hambalang）山区的乡村庄园。她计划辞职。【原文：Over the last weekend in August, after her house was ransacked by looters, Indonesia’s then-Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati traveled to President Prabowo Subianto’s country estate in the Hambalang hills in West Java. She planned to resign.】

item.title: 共同基金计划雪上加霜，中国长债跌势加剧
item.description: 中国较长期限国债的抛售愈演愈烈，共同基金费用的拟议调整给本已因长期转向股票而备受煎熬的市场雪上加霜。【原文：A selloff in China’s longer-dated government bonds is getting worse, as proposed changes to mutual funds fees add more pain to a market that was already suffering from a prolonged rotation to stocks.】

item.title: 印度股市努力吸引外国投资者回归
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台风使菲律宾失业率升至三年新高
item.description: 一连串的台风和季风雨将菲律宾的失业率推向了三年来的最高点，凸显了气候变化对这个热带气旋频发的东南亚国家的经济影响。【原文：A string of typhoons and monsoon rains pushed the Philippines’ jobless rate to a three-year high, highlighting the economic impact of climate change to the Southeast Asian nation that’s prone to tropical cyclones.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴新增 1.4 亿美元补贴助推中国商战
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）将再投入 10 亿元人民币（合 1.4 亿美元）的奖励措施，为其最受欢迎的在线服务之一带来更多流量，从而在争夺中国消费者的持续战斗中加大对京东和美团的压力。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is committing another 1 billion yuan ($140 million) of incentives to drive more traffic to one of its most popular online services, cranking up the heat on JD.com Inc. and Meituan in their ongoing battle for Chinese consumers.】

item.title: 财政部长离职后印尼债券需求和股市受到打击
item.description: 印尼财政部长斯里-穆利亚尼-英德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）突然被免职，投资者情绪低落，导致印尼股市出现四月以来最大的资金外流。【原文：An Indonesian government bond auction on Tuesday drew weak demand while the nation’s stocks saw their biggest outflow since April, after the sudden removal of Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati sapped investor sentiment.】

item.title: 需求疲软，中国消费通胀率降至零以下
item.description: 随着政府打击过度竞争和产能过剩，中国消费价格三个月来首次跌破零点，但工厂通货紧缩出现缓解迹象。【原文：China’s consumer prices slipped below zero for the first time in three months but factory deflation showed signs of easing, as the government cracks down on excessive competition and overcapacity.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车在新加坡的市场份额将随着回扣的扩大而增加
item.description: 在新加坡政府将电动汽车激励政策至少再延长 12 个月后，比亚迪公司等中国汽车制造商似乎将加强对新加坡市场的控制。【原文：Chinese automakers like BYD Co. look set to tighten their grip on Singapore’s market, after the city-state extended electric vehicle incentives for at least another 12 months.】

item.title: 银行查封资产，香港房地产困境拖累施罗德集团
item.description: 施罗德集团（Schroders Plc）成为最新一家被卷入香港商业地产崩盘的全球资产管理公司。【原文：Schroders Plc has become the latest global asset manager to be caught up in Hong Kong’s commercial property meltdown.】

item.title: 对冲基金因日本央行发出鹰派信号而加大日元期权赌注
item.description: 周二有消息称，尽管政局不稳，日本央行官员仍对今年再次加息持开放态度，对冲基金因此增加了对日元的看涨期权押注。【原文：Hedge funds added to bullish options wagers on the Japanese yen Tuesday following news that Bank of Japan officials were open to the idea of raising interest rates again this year, despite the political instability.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，埃利奥特入股日本关西电力公司
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management Corp.【原文：Elliott Management Corp. has taken a stake in Japanese regional utility Kansai Electric Power Co., the Financial Times reported.】

item.title: Klarna 向风险投资者红杉资本交付 27 亿美元收益
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 的首次上市将为其最大投资者红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）带来数十亿美元的意外之财，因为这家 "先买后付 "的公司将其股票定价为每股 40 美元，隐含市值为 151 亿美元。【原文：Klarna Group Plc’s market debut is set to bring a multibillion-dollar windfall to its largest investor, Sequoia Capital, after the buy-now-pay-later company priced its shares at $40 a share at an implied market value of $15.1 billion.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布前，黄金维持在略低于纪录的位置
item.description: 由于交易商评估了美国数据，这些数据加强了美联储降息的理由，黄金在略低于纪录的水平上保持稳定。【原文：Gold steadied just below a record as traders evaluated US data that strengthened the case for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 政策乐观情绪升温，韩国股票基准指数再创新高
item.description: 韩国基准股指短暂突破了 2021 年创下的收盘纪录，对国内政策改革的乐观情绪和积极的全球利好有助于延续今年全球最火爆的股市反弹之一。【原文：South Korea’s benchmark stock index briefly traded above a record close reached in 2021, as optimism over domestic policy reforms and positive global tailwinds help extend one of the world’s hottest equity rallies of this year.】

item.title: 苹果的 iPhone 17 系列可能是升级者翘首以盼的更新换代产品
item.description: 经过多年的更新换代，苹果公司的 iPhone 系列产品再次让人感到兴奋。【原文：After years of incremental refreshes, Apple Inc.’s iPhone lineup feels exciting again.】

item.title: 中国锂矿将提前重启，锂股大幅下跌
item.description: 有消息称，上个月闲置的一座中国矿山可能会比预期更早重启，这对电池材料的价格构成了新的压力，锂生产商的业绩因此下滑。【原文：Lithium producers slumped on news that a Chinese mine idled last month may restart sooner than expected, threatening fresh pressure on prices for the battery material.】

item.title: Salesforce 首席执行官称目标是恢复两位数增长
item.description: Salesforce Inc.首席执行官马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）表示，随着公司年收入接近 500 亿美元，他打算让公司的销售额重新实现两位数增长。【原文：Salesforce Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff said his intention is to get the company back into double-digit sales growth as its revenue approaches $50 billion a year.】

item.title: 从出口商到债券交易商，印度央行正面临介入的呼声
item.description: 从受到美国惩罚性关税打击的出口商，到受到债券警戒者恐慌的银行国债，印度央行正面临越来越多的呼吁，要求进行干预以帮助遏制损失。【原文：From exporters battered by punitive US tariffs to bank treasuries unnerved by bond vigilantes, India’s central bank is facing increasing calls to intervene to help stem losses.】

item.title: 美联储结束对三井住友的执法行动
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会表示，已终止对三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：The US Federal Reserve Board said it has terminated its enforcement action against Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.】

item.title: NAB 将削减 410 个支持职位，并将部分银行业务转移至印度
item.description: 据金融部门工会称，澳大利亚市值第二大的贷款机构澳大利亚国民银行有限公司（National Australia Bank Ltd.）将在其技术和企业运营部门裁员 410 人。【原文：National Australia Bank Ltd., the nation’s second-largest lender by market value, is cutting 410 jobs within its technology and enterprise operations division, according to the Finance Sector Union.】

item.title: 交易商权衡特朗普的关税威胁和多哈罢工，石油价格攀升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普告诉欧盟官员他愿意对印度和中国征收新的关税，以促使俄罗斯与乌克兰进行谈判之后，石油连续第三个交易日上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a third session after President Donald Trump told European Union officials he’s willing to slap new tariffs on India and China in an effort to get Russia to negotiate with Ukraine.】

item.title: 比特币代理 Metaplanet 在海外销售中将股票定价为 553 日元
item.description: 日本比特币库 Metaplanet 公司将以 553 日元的价格发行新股，这是该公司为增强加密货币购买力所做的最新努力。【原文：Japanese Bitcoin treasury Metaplanet Inc. will issue new shares at ¥553, in its latest effort to strengthen buying power for the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: IFM 称，地缘政治风险引发基础设施建设热潮
item.description: 地缘政治风险和宏观经济波动的加剧正促使越来越多的基金经理转向基础设施投资，因为他们在寻找有助于分散风险和对冲通胀的长期赌注。【原文：Heightened geopolitical risk and macroeconomic volatility are driving more and more fund managers to infrastructure investments as they look for long-term bets that can help diversify and hedge against inflation.】

item.title: 中国保险公司买入股票助推慢牛行情
item.description: 中国保险公司响应中国政府的号召，将其股票投资增加到至少三年来的最高水平，以建立一个缓慢而稳定的牛市。【原文：Chinese insurance firms have increased their equity exposure to the highest level in at least three years, heeding Beijing’s call to build a slow and steady bull market.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片热潮推动康佰康和阿里巴巴股价上涨
item.description: 芯片制造商和云计算股票是中国推动本土技术发展的主要受益者。【原文：Chip manufacturers and cloud stocks are among the major beneficiaries of China’s push for homegrown technology.】

item.title: 日本将举行石破宣布退出后的首次新债销售会
item.description: 自首相石破茂表示将下台以来，日本周三的五年期国债拍卖将是对市场对新国债胃口的首次考验。【原文：Japan’s five-year debt auction on Wednesday will be the first test of the market’s appetite for new government bonds since Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said he will step down.】
